Pipe operator ("dot arrow").

Defined as: a %.>% b roughly ~ { . <- a; b }; (with visible .-side effects). Please see http://www.win-vector.com/blog/2017/07/in-praise-of-syntactic-sugar/.

pipe_left_arg %.>% pipe_right_arg

Arguments

pipe_left_arg

left argument expression (substituted into .)
pipe_right_arg

right argument expession (presumably including .)

Value

eval({ . <- pipe_left_arg; pipe_right_arg };)

Examples


# both should be equal:
cos(exp(sin(4)))
#> [1] 0.8919465
4 %.>% sin(.) %.>% exp(.) %.>% cos(.)
#> [1] 0.8919465

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Examples
